Talon:
 
Talon went to the cave's entrace and keept hidden, her duties was=
 to keep her friends safe and she would do it
 



To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 17 Aug 2011 13:35:32 -0400
Subjec=
t: Re: Strange meetings - Finding lost friends







Tucson now sees the s=
huttle ahead and tries desperately to keep his altitude stable.  He extends=
 his wings to their fullest to catch a strong pocket of wind beneath them. =
 It seems to work nicely as he makes a last minute effort to glide quickly =
toward the shuttle.  


" I - am coming - in - now. " 


With extremely low=
 energy supplies Tucson's transformation program forces him back into beast=
 mode to preserve what is left of his fuel.   He manages to hold onto Silve=
rbolt during the conversion, with his front claws.  He barely makes it into=
 the shuttle, as he folds in his wings in a clumsy manner, dragging his und=
erbelly on the floor of the shuttle.  


He sets his friend down gently ont=
o a platform and then collapses himself.  His breath is labored yet he is s=
till able to keep himself online.  And even in his compromised state, he st=
ill carries an air of his famous temperament, as he narrows his eyes with a=
 low growl in his voice.


" About Rodimus...  If he chose to turn on our f=
action, then so be it.  Instead of taking the initiative to fend off the te=
mptation, he has opted for an easy way out instead.  I did what I could to =
save him!  I can not do any more than that! "


He snaps his tail in annoya=
nce.  


" He has no sense of responsibility, self confidence, or the inept=
itude to overcome a major adversity!  Of course he is vulnerable to possess=
ion!  HE WANTS IT THAT WAY, IT'S THE EASIEST WAY AROUND A DIFFICULT SITUATI=
ON!"


He slaps a heavy front paw down on the shuttle floor.  Now exhausted=
, he tries to catch his breath. Yet he looks to Leo Prime as he fights to k=
eep his head and long neck up off the shuttle floor.


" Leo Prime, the bes=
t thing to do is to relinquish his Prime status and revert him back to Hot =
Rod, where he can do no harm.  From now on, until I am restored, I ask that=
 you assume all leadership duties while I recover.  Promise me you will - d=
o as I request?"


He can no longer hold up his head and lays it back on th=
e floor.  Yet he looks to Stanton while conversing with Leo Prime.  It was =
clear to him that Rodimus was quite comfortable where he was and that now i=
t was time to do something about him.  The silver dragon hardens to the ide=
a of having to fight against a friend who now proves to be his greatest foe=
.  A look of sheer determination covers his face as he remains grounded for=
 the time being. 

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 17=
, 2011, at 12:30 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:




  =


> <OLD>
>
> Tucson looks down to Silverbolt. He had seen a shred of life =
and then
> nothing. He had always tried to keep his composure but he could =
not help
> but let a tear of despair run down his right cheek.
>
> " No! Si=
lverbolt, don't do this to me!"
>
> At first he doesn't answer Leo Prime. S=
ilverbolt was his priority now. He
> quickly places a hand on Silverbolts c=
hest and performs an energy
> transfusion from his body to Silverbolt. Yet =
his own reserves were not at a
> hundred percent either. He didn't care, al=
l he cared about was getting his
> friend back to the shuttle with what lif=
e he could give him.
>
> As energy flows from his body into Silverbolts Tuc=
son begins to falter a bit
> in mid air. Yet as swift as he was in flight, =
he could see the shuttle
> ahead. But would he make it in time before his o=
wn system shut down?
>
> " Just a little more. Almost there. Leo Rodimus is=
 not respondent at
> this time. I - have not received word as - of yet."
>
=
> He struggles to fight off the urge to make an emergency landing. Instead =
he
> uses the last of his reserves to speed up his flight pace and is now j=
ust a
> few feet from the shuttle, but losing altitude while doing so.
>
> =
" Can't keep the altitude much longer. I'm coming in. Have the - shuttle
> =
ready for boarding..."

<NEW>

The energy infusion from TUSCON into SILVERB=
OLT, while leaving TUSCON
extremely tired seems to have a beneficial affect=
. His optics light
very dimly. He is no where near conscious, but his spark=
 energy
continues to stay lit at a very low level.

"I read you." LEO PRIME=
 says over the comlink. "The shuttle should be
reaching you momentairlly. O=
nce you recharge we will need someone to
make absolutely sure that Rodimus =
is a Predacon now." There a short
pause as LEO's voice drops slightly. "He =
deserves that, and I believe
he deserves our most earnest effort."

Even as=
 LEO stopped talking the shuttle can be seen on the horizon,
its boxy shape=
 was dark in the skies of early morning. The sun had not
yet risen in the s=
kies of ancient Earth but the light of it was making
itself seen at last. A=
 new day was about to be born, and hopefully new
hope as well.

"We see you=
." SANTON said over a short range to TUSCON, "The doors
will be open and re=
ady for you when you arrive. We have the supplies
you need."

(TAG)

Presto=
n
